attributes.action: strip 'Sir' John Butterfill of his knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir John Butterfill claimed up to £1,778 a month towards the mortgage interest of what he said was his second home for 5 years. He then avoided capital gains tax by telling the taxman that this Surrey mansion was his first home. This falls significantly below the standard we expect from public figures and sets a terrible example of greed and selfishness to our youth.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
